title: Script german style
content:
anyone knows if there is digitized something like this?   
   
thanks   
   
 ![schrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16008.jpg)
author: carlos_moreno

comments.content: FF Prater Script is something like it, but obviously different. There is something familiar about this font, but I cannot recall where I saw it before. That's the best I can suggest right now.

my first thought were that it is a font from a french design bureau. but it's not.   
 [http://www.ateliertelescopique.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.ateliertelescopique.com/)   
   
where does your sample come from?

Is this close enough?   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16071.gif)   
   
Mike, Prater Script is really nice.

thanks a lot for your efforts! unfortunately, FF Prater, Nordik Fish and the beautiful Karen's script lose that germanic scholar feel of , say, 10's or 20's. The sample comes from a pic taken in a french concetration camp for spanish children in the civil war 1936-1939.   
   
   
  ![nini](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16089.jpg)

Hola Carlos, and from Madrid too.   
Have you seen Memima from Type-o-tones?   
 [http://www.type-o-tones.com/p\_fonts/p\_memi.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/p_fonts/p_memi.htm)   
I know it is not the same but...   
I think someone will find something closer

I'm afraid Memima isn't what I'm looking for... but this one is closer. I hope it will be easier   
   
 ![parr](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16193.jpg)   
   
thaks to you all

a classical typeface for this age is sütterlin. maybe schulschrift works too ?   
   
 [sütterlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/suetterlin-ef/)   
 [schulschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.fontshop.de/sukr.php3?searchtext=schulschrift&searchtype=fo-kw&action.x=33&action.y=14&fsdsess=959cc84d967c2b82b1f7e512b28588a0&ch=search.php3&fl=y)   
---   
 [sütterlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.ostpreussenseiten.de/schriften.htm)   
 [schulschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.lothosoft.ch/schriften/)

I believe that the last sample is Monoline Script:   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monoline-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051309/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/monoline-script/)
